data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This kitchen is a disaster! It ____ like ____ used ____ bowl ____ pan ____ our ____, ____ left ____ dirty ____ half-full ____ ingredients. This ____ scene ____ be ____ up ____. We are hosting guests tonight, and I cannot have them see the house in this state.
data.partBlankContent: This kitchen is a disaster! It lo___ like y__ used ev___ bowl a__ pan i_ our cabi____, a__ left th__ dirty a__ half-full o_ ingredients. This cha____ scene mu__ be cle____ up immed______. We are hosting guests tonight, and I cannot have them see the house in this state.
data.fullContent: This kitchen is a disaster! It looks like you used every bowl and pan in our cabinets, and left them dirty and half-full of ingredients. This chaotic scene must be cleaned up immediately. We are hosting guests tonight, and I cannot have them see the house in this state.
data.answer: 这个厨房糟透了!看起来你把橱柜里的碗和锅都用了，并且把它们弄脏了，还剩了一半食物在里面。这混乱的场面必须立即清理。今晚我们要招待客人，我不能让他们在这个状态下参观房子。
